attributes.action: Dabate whether to withdraw the U K from all Climate Change initiatives.
attributes.additional_details: These agreements look like a massive redistribution of the United kingdoms, Industry, jobs, and wealth to other countries. The intrests of the UK should be paramount.
attributes.background: The effects of this government project is becoming more and more apparent to the general public and questions are now being asked 'if we are going in the right direction with this'. A fully transparent debate will address these concerns and check it benefits people in the UK.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions which call for similar actions: 

Repeal the Climate Change Act 2008 and Net Zero targets 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701600

Hold a referendum on achieving net zero goals. 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701342
